name: Hitmonchan
flavorText: While seeming to do nothing, it fires punches in lightning-fast volleys that are impossible to see.

strengths: Jab: 20 damage for 1 energy is incredibly efficient
Basic Pokemon - can attack turn 1 going second
70 HP is solid for a Basic
Fighting type hits Colorless weakness (Chansey, Clefairy)
Special Punch scales damage as game progresses
weaknesses: Falls off in late game against evolved Pokemon
counters: Mewtwo - Psychic type with high damage
Mr. Mime - Invisible Wall blocks both attacks

competitiveHistory: Hitmonchan was the face of the Haymaker archetype, which dominated early competitive Pokemon TCG. The deck's strategy of fast, efficient attackers combined with disruption (Energy Removal, Gust of Wind) defined the metagame and remained tier 1 throughout the Base Set era.
